description: Wonderful detached villa in La Pedriza A little more than ten minutes walk from the town centre, we find this beautiful house on three floors, with a comfortable plot of 575 m2 that borders directly on the Guadarrama National Park. The plot can be entered either through a pedestrian gate or an automated gate for vehicles. We access through the main door to a large hall, from which you can glimpse the distribution of the house. From here you will find on the left hand side the spacious kitchen with a glazed gallery. On the right hand side, as well as a guest toilet, you will see the staircase leading to the first floor or semi-basement.  Facing the entrance hall, we discover a stately and spacious lounge, a sitting area and a dining area where you can receive your guests. Going up to the first floor, we access the three bedrooms and their two large bathrooms. All of them have built-in wardrobes and natural light, and offer views that will surprise you. On the lower floor, which is isolated by a door for the change of atmosphere, you will find a large independent flat with its own complete bathroom and kitchen, as well as a laundry and ironing room and a large storeroom. From here, you can access the garage with a capacity for three vehicles, with a toilet that also serves the garden area. In Manzanares el Real we discover this cosy detached villa with east-west orientation. We are just a step away from getting into the heart of nature, with the unbeatable landscape that represents the National Park of the Sierra de Guadarrama, which borders directly with the house. It is a beautiful village in the northern Sierra of Madrid. The location of this property is perfect, as it is in a cul-de-sac avenue, giving the impression of being in a small community of independent villas, which is only a five minute walk from the centre of the village. You will have all the services you may need, thanks to being just over 40 kilometres from Madrid. Access is quick, as we have two main roads that will take us to the capital, the M-607 and the A-6. We are just over 10 minutes from Villalba, which has a hospital, train station, theatres, as well as a complete gastronomic offer. If you are looking for contact with nature, bear in mind that we are at the foot of La Maliciosa, La Barranca and La Pedriza. The tourist enclave of this town is undeniable, and is reflected by its influx of tourists every day of the year, as without hardly moving, we will discover the Santillana reservoir with its attraction for birdwatchers and fishermen; La Pedriza, a reference throughout Europe as a destination for mountaineers, the town being presided over by the imposing and well-preserved Castle of Manzanares. Manzanares el Real is surrounded by emblematic villages such as Soto del Real, Moralzarzal, Becerril, Navacerrada, El Boalo and Matalpino.

Magnificent villa with EXCEPTIONAL VIEWS in Manzanares el Real, adjacent to the Pedriza Regional Park. 210m2 house, located on a 520m2 plot. It consists of 3 floors; Basement floor: From the entrance through the garage there is access to a cozy cellar, which has its own kitchen. The cellar has a fireplace that is connected to the heating system. This system allows the entire house to maintain an adequate temperature in winter. Ground floor: A small flight of stairs gives access to the first floor, with a large, bright living room that has a second fireplace. The living room has access to a living room / bedroom and two bathrooms. On this floor we also find the kitchen. Upper floor: From the staircase in the living room, we access the second floor. It has 3 large bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. From the bedrooms there is access to the main terrace of the house, with spectacular views of both the town of Manzanares el Real and the Valley (La Pedriza). Floor plan: There is a last floor plan prepared to locate two glass skylights that have already been acquired by the property. Most of this action to give habitability to this area has already been carried out. It has a VIDEO INTERCOM on all floors, the blinds are Majorcan and are motorized. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes. The garden that surrounds the house is very well cared for, with various species and in it is the large and cozy barbecue area for family gatherings. Manzanares el Real is very well connected to Madrid by motorway and the M607 road. It has public transport to Plaza de Castilla and Moncloa. There are many services and activities in the area, especially related to mountain sports. The historical complex of the Castle is important, very well preserved. Hospitals in a short radius, both in the north of Madrid and in Collado Villalba and El Escorial. Wide gastronomic offer in the area.

Charming and comfortable semi-detached house. Very sunny due to its orientation and bright. Excellent condition, many improvements and updates have been made. It has very good qualities and is ready to move into. Distribution: ENTRANCE FLOOR: Access through a beautiful glazed porch, a good-sized entrance hall with a built-in wardrobe, a toilet with a window, a separate kitchen with space for a daily table and a spacious living-dining room with access to the garden and pool. FIRST FLOOR: 4 large bedrooms (all doubles) and 2 bathrooms (Main en suite). Two of the bedrooms have a small balcony. GARAGE/APARTMENT FLOOR: This floor was renovated and converted into a beautiful apartment that has a small open-plan kitchen, a bedroom, a large bathroom and a very bright and sunny living-dining room with a wall-to-wall glass enclosure. This space is ideal for temporary rental or for visits, as it has a separate entrance. By simply removing the enclosure and installing a door, it becomes a large garage again. On this floor there is a sealed room where the boiler and tank are located, as well as a small storage room. The entire house has underfloor heating, except the garage/apartment floor which has radiators connected to the boiler. Double windows in PVC and white aluminum with double glass each in all bedrooms and mosquito nets. Walls with smooth paint throughout the house. Large built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms. Ceramic floors. Installation of alarm and armored door. Plot with a large paved exterior entrance area for parking 2 vehicles with access through a motorized garage door. Side garden and rear garden with very beautiful views of the mountains, Pedriza and Yelmo. Pergola with awning, built-in barbecue, area with a small organic garden and swimming pool. The house is located in the urban area, a 5-minute walk to the center of town. Next to all types of shops and services.

REDPISO SELLS cozy and bright DUPLEX in one of the best areas of the town, a very quiet street close to all commercial services with beautiful views of La Pedriza. The main floor has 90 m2 very well distributed in an entrance hall, a nice living room with a terrace, an independent kitchen with good storage capacity and granite countertops, three large bedrooms and two bathrooms, one with a bathtub and the other with a shower. From the living room we have the access stairs to the second floor, a wonderful open-plan attic with a Velux window and with many possibilities, including the possibility of building two bedrooms. The house has very good qualities, renovated kitchen and bathrooms and tilt-and-turn PVC Climalit windows. Building from 1999 with only six neighbors. Feel free to visit.

Detached Villa in the heart of La Pedriza National Park. Excellent construction of the year 2009 on a plot of 509m2. Excellent state of conservation, very good qualities, ready to move into. It stands out for its large and spacious windows, very bright and with excellent views of the mountains and the Santillana reservoir. It consists of the following distribution: ENTRANCE FLOOR (98m2): Access terrace of about 22m2. Entrance hall, access to a spacious living room with different environments, the fireplace has an air outlet to the stairwell and the master bedroom. Kitchen with dining area. A bathroom with shower and a bedroom. FIRST FLOOR (81m2): 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a small attic room for multiple uses. All the bedrooms are double with large built-in wardrobes (all lined and dressed), highlighting the master bedroom for its spaciousness, the views and the large bathroom that it has incorporated with a window. 230 hectares with a hunting reserve (wild boar, rabbit, hare), scrubland, 7 buildings to be rehabilitated, well water, a pond and a stream that runs through the farm. Located in the Regional Park of La Cuenca Alta del Manzanares. 4 homes, 1 of them to be renovated, the other 3 with a sunken roof, and 3 more buildings scattered around the farm for animals also to be rehabilitated. Very good views of Madrid and the entire mountain range. Approximately 1/3 of the property is a very dense forest where wild boars, rabbits and hares are hunted, another higher area with views, pastures and forest, an ideal area for trekking and mountain paths or bicycles, and another mountain area with incredible views of Madrid, the Sierra de Guadarrama, the Santillana Reservoir, La Cuerda Larga, etc. ideal area for mountaineering. Easy access by road and path in good condition to the property and to the main house, without the need for an off-road vehicle. There are more interior roads that, due to lack of traffic, are almost gone and covered by vegetation. Less than 40 minutes from Madrid Capital. The property, due to its characteristics, enjoys notable natural and landscape wealth, which, together with its proximity to the city of Madrid, makes it especially interesting. description: Great independent House / Chalet for sale in Manzanares El Real. This single-family home is located on a 998 m² corner plot and has a traditional ashlar stone construction, with 50 cm walls. Built in 1975, this house needs renovations, but offers great room for improvement. It is located just 200 meters from the Manzanares El Real health center and has views of the reservoir. The town center is nearby, so you will have all the services at your fingertips. The building is independent and consists of 2 floors, in addition to a separate building with a studio on the first floor and a garage/storage room on the ground floor. In the main building, on the ground floor, you will find a covered porch, a large living room with fireplace, 2 bathrooms, 4 bedrooms and a kitchen. In the basement, there is another living room, a kitchen, a bathroom and 2 bedrooms. The house has a constructed area of 340 m² and useful areas of 300 m². It has 6 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. In addition, it has a terrace, built-in wardrobes and storage room. The orientation of the house is North, South, East and West, which guarantees good lighting in all rooms. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this house and discover all the possibilities it offers.

With a distribution of 3 bedrooms, kitchen, large living room with terrace and 2 full bathrooms, this property is perfect for a family. In addition, it has all the amenities at hand, since it is located near the town square and local shops. If you have always dreamed of living in a place surrounded by history, culture and natural beauty, this is your opportunity. This magnificent duplex apartment is located in an exceptional location, in the heart of Manzanares El Real, one of the most charming towns in the Community of Madrid. With its 133 square meters built, this bright and cozy apartment offers everything you need to enjoy a comfortable and quiet life. Its spacious rooms, perfectly distributed, will give you the necessary space to create the home of your dreams. The fully equipped kitchen will be the ideal place to delight your guests with exquisite homemade dishes. In addition, it has a spacious living-dining room, perfect for family gatherings and relaxing moments. But the best thing about this apartment is undoubtedly its privileged location. You can immerse yourself in the history of the Mendoza Castle, located a few meters from your door, or take a walk through the beautiful gardens of the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares Regional Park, which surround this idyllic town. In addition, you will have all the necessary services at your fingertips: shops, restaurants, schools and public transportation. Without forgetting the easy connection with Madrid capital, which will allow you to enjoy the cosmopolitan and cultural life that the big city offers, without giving up the tranquility and beauty of living in the countryside. Don't miss the opportunity to acquire this fantastic apartment in the heart of Manzanares El Real. Call us now and we will give you more information! Your new home awaits you!
